name: FFB x Shogun (R.I.P. Edition) Tee
description: FFB X SHOGUN (R.I.P. EDITION) TEE S/S Tee (Black) This shirt released in 2009 during the first year of FFB's existence. It was the first collab tee I ever did and I teamed up with my favorite local streetwear shop, the now defunct SHOGUN. The tee was sold exclusively at Shogun and sold out in minutes! Since then, fans who never got a chance to get this shirt continue to ask me if it will ever make a return. Well, now's your chance! There are a few slight differences from the original release so that it doesn't take away from the original. The main difference is this. • EXTREMELY LIMITED • 100% combed cotton. • 100% made in the beautiful USA. • 100% sweatshop free. • Inspected by THE Fur Face Boy.

name: Fur Face Kicks
description:
For all you sneaker fanatics out there, you know that your sneakers don’t mean much without the box! AND LOOK! Bear Mai too!

Only a few left in select sizes! Snag one up while you still can!

• 100% combed cotton.
• 100% made in the beautiful USA.
• 100% sweatshop free.
• Inspected by THE Fur Face Boy.

name: Fur Face Diggler (Champion Edition)
description:
FUR FACE DIGGLER (Champion Edition) S/S Tee (Royal Blue) MY Dallas Mavericks put the beat down on the Evil Empire to FINALLY win an NBA Championship! And to celebrate MY Mavs winning it all, the FUR FACE DIGGLER is back, only this time.....as a CHAMPION! The FUR FACE DIGGLER (Champion Edition) tee will be available through PRE-ORDER ONLY until Wednesday, June 15 at 11:59pm (CST), so be sure to secure this LIMITED-TIME tee today before time runs out! Shirts are scheduled to ship out to YOU on Saturday, June 18th.

Thanks to the Mavs, my life is pretty much now complete! • PRE-ORDER ONLY until Wednesday, June 15 at 11:59pm. • 100% combed cotton. • 100% made in the beautiful USA. • 100% sweatshop free. • Inspected by THE Fur Face Boy.

name: Fur Face Diggler
description: FUR FACE DIGGLER S/S Tee (Green) EVERYONE! My screen printer had a few extra FUR FACE DIGGLER tee’s laying around! So if you’d like one, this is most likely your final chance to snag one of these bad boys before it’s completely gone! Since 1998, I've been lucky to witness Dirk Nowitzki grow and develop into a one-of-a-kind NBA player as well as the greatest Dallas Maverick of all-time! Forget getting married, having kids and trying to save a million dollars....my life will be complete when MY Dallas Mavericks win it all! GO MAVS! WoOoOoOoo! • Only a few remain! • 100% combed cotton. • 100% made in the beautiful USA. • 100% sweatshop free. • Inspected by THE Fur Face Boy.

description: MEGA FFB S/S Tee (Royal) I’ve always been a MEGA fan and MEGA badass when it came to playing 8-bit MEGA MAN titles. Hence...MEGA FFB! • 100% combed cotton. • 100% made in the beautiful USA. • 100% sweatshop free. • Inspected by THE Fur Face Boy.

name: FFB Seal

name: FFB Script
description: FFB SCRIPT S/S Tee (Navy) I still like to mess around with typography every now and then. Can you feel the way the line widths flow? Can you feel the whimsical nature of this design? name: FFB Clean Tee
description: FFB CLEAN TEE S/S Tee (Heather Grey) Who doesn't like a simple t-shirt? Heather grey with a woven FFB on the left chest. It's so clean, you don't even need to shower before wearing it. • 100% combed cotton. • 100% made in the beautiful USA. • 100% sweatshop free. • Inspected by THE Fur Face Boy.

name: Angel Bear Mai
description: ANGEL BEAR MAI S/S Tee (Sky Blue) As some of you may know, my best buddy / FFB staple character and brand name, Bear Mai passed away this past summer. He crosses my mind every single day and I truly do miss him. I wish that he was still next to me gnawing away at his paws and whining for walks as I stay up late at night working on various art, design and FFB projects. Without a doubt, there's a HUMONGOUS void in my heart since he passed, but I know he's now in a better place. Here's to the OG FFB, here's to the one and only, Bear Mai! • 100% combed cotton. • 100% made in the beautiful USA. • 100% sweatshop free. • Inspected by THE Fur Face Boy.

name: FFB Zippy
description: FFB ZIPPY L/S Zip-up Hoody (Black) If you know me, you know that I'm usually wearing some kind of hoody. Hoodies makes me look like I have more weight and the hood itself, slightly disguises my bad posture. Anyways, a simple black zippy-hoody with a white FFB logo on the left chest will now complete your more weighted / disguised bad posture appearance. What more can you ask for? • 100% combed cotton. • 100% made in the beautiful USA. • 100% sweatshop free. • Inspected by THE Fur Face Boy.

description: CREATIVE DEPT. K L/S Crewneck Sweatshirt (Heather) Everybody seems to be property of some sort of Athletic Department, but no one's ever apart of some sort of Creative Department, well...now you can be! • 100% combed cotton. • 100% made in the beautiful USA. • 100% sweatshop free. • Inspected by THE Fur Face Boy.
